title: Having issues Patching 7.6? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

Galio is here and....wayyyyy taller than we remember.

http://i.imgur.com/D0WULsw.jpg

Suffice to say, Malphite and Nautilus have to be a little peeved to have  someone they could've simply stepped on before, now look at them in the eye when he stands up.

If you find yourself in a staring contest with the Patcher as it slows to a crawl or seemingly doesn't work, make sure to follow the steps below to turn the tide of battle in your favor!  If nothing seems to help, drop a comment and we'll be happy to help!

---------------------------------------------------------

#***Updated Client (Beta Client)***

>*** Error: "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client or try again."***

This issue rears its ugly head if something went wrong in either the updating or the installation process of the Client Update. The solution is to complete a full and clean reinstallation of League by following [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to a T.

>***My IP Balance in the Store is incorrect***

There have been some issues with the client pulling correct IP balances. Some players have been able to resolve this by launching into the Legacy Client and making a single purchase to resolve this. If this does not work, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work together to resolve this.

>***I toggled the language filter off but still see words too rich for my tastes***

We've seen a few reports of the mature language filter not toggling correctly.  It's now possible to disable and enable the filter in-game by typing:  **/chatfilter** into the in-game chat.  For the more visually inclined, [check out this screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/K92fiCb.png).

-----------------------------------------------------------

#***Legacy Client***

>***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

replies.body: Hi, I love this game but it says my patch has failed. I have tried restarting and I have tried using hexpatch tool but it has failed. What should I do?

At what point exactly does it say patch has failed, and is this on the updated or legacy client?  Which option did you specifically use on the HRT?  A repatch can help resolve any issues the patcher may have run into during your update.  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4UrBFbZT,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-03-22T17:20:34.310+0000)
>
> At what point exactly does it say patch has failed, and is this on the updated or legacy client?  Which option did you specifically use on the HRT?  A repatch can help resolve any issues the patcher may have run into during your update.  Let me know!

Well when I install the game it says "The patch has failed and we don't know why" and it is on the new client, legacy failed me when I tried to install it on the client. I have reset my league, restarted my computer and even tried hexpatch (as I have already mentioned)

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBreakers,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4UrBFbZT,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2017-03-24T18:36:05.529+0000)
>
> Well when I install the game it says "The patch has failed and we don't know why" and it is on the new client, legacy failed me when I tried to install it on the client. I have reset my league, restarted my computer and even tried hexpatch (as I have already mentioned)

got this same thing .-. the 004 error code..

what am i supposed to do with the connection guide fam.. that thing is about packet losses, Proxies and wired connections.. I already have a wired connection, I dont use vpn or proxies so please.. OLG WildPanda said it right..

Hi Riot, I'm getting an error whenever I try to update. It just tells me it is unspecified and to check logs. I did two full reinstalls and it is not working. Please help, I wanna try out dat sick new galio!
i have the exact problem and i also need help. can someone update the best solution please.

> [{quoted}](name=Enen,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4UrBFbZT,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2017-03-23T14:19:44.069+0000)
>
> Hi Riot, I'm getting an error whenever I try to update. It just tells me it is unspecified and to check logs. I did two full reinstalls and it is not working. Please help, I wanna try out dat sick new galio!

I am getting the same error.. I just want to play some league. It was even working for me earlier, I closed my client to switch accounts and all of a sudden it start patching, and then didn't work. The OG comment is 11 hours old.. Riot help us!

If you're seeing this error before it gets to 33%, there's a good chance your OS is blocking the patcher from running. In this case, check out our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to be sure your OS has the permissions to allow League to run.

Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help!
Hey Enen!  The unspecified error can occur for a few reasons, so I'll need some more info.  More specifically, at what percent exactly are you getting that error?  Let me know!

Sorry, I've been busy with real life so I just checked today. My client is trying to update to the new client I believe and as it scans the files it tells me there is an error. Because of this I get 0% complete and only around 14 files scanned before every time I say ok, another unspecified error occurs.

Thanks for the info, and don't worry I can help!  Getting an unspecified error that early in the patcher indicates that a security setting on your OS or some software is blocking your game files from scanning.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your system is allowing league as an exception.  Let me know if you have any questions.

I have followed all of the steps and there seems to be no issues revolving around this. I can send a screenshot of what is going on so you can see the issue. I would use puush.me if that is ok with you guys. I have also used the hextech repair tool and nothing seems to work.

edit: Also I see some people said they just closed it and reopened and it worked. This has not been the case for me. I have restarted my computer around 4 times since this has happened and nothing has worked.

Bummer.  :/  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this with you.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach the logs they provide to your ticket.  We'll get back to you asap.

Hey I know its been a while but now im only getting past 33% then as it continues it will stop at random percents, first 99 then 70.
I have followed both the permission and connection guides but neither have seemed to help. Please, ive spent a shameful amount of money in this game and dont want it to be for not.
Hello :) So what happend is a wanted to patch the new patch 7.6 and it automaticly camed on 33% and download until 71% and that unspesified error accured error popped :( help me pls  :)

when i log into my account the top left button that says play instead has a loading screen stuck at 0% then shortly after give me an error stating the following "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004). I have restarted the client multiple times and i still get the same error.
Hey Riot support, I keep getting error code 004, I have tried the Hextech repair tool and it didn't work. Plz help, I need to play League.

This error code can happen when your network is failing to hold a connection to the patching server and grab updates.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and restore those comms.  I hope that helps!
Yeah thanks for the suggestion, but I've already gone over that with dArt, I have also gone over and gotten the logs from the Hextech Repair Tool

Hey there, i've some login issues, it just wont login, only says some unexpected error did happen, or something like that, (i play it in Hungarian language) it's written with red latters, and can't do sh*t about it, tried your hextech toolkit, went through the forced update, and tried to reinstall from the toolkit too. Nothing has changed with my login issue. And cant send the report from the toolkit, cause the player support website just won't load in .... 
Any suggestions? I played yesterday a lot with the 7.6, so the issue is not with the new patch i guees. By the way I did not install anything from yesterday till today morning which could cause any problems like this. And yesterday evening i got some bugsplats too, which i am not used to.
Looking forward to your answer. Ty

Good fucking job riot just when i start ranked my league is crashing and i can't recconect ur fucking suck just make this game normal with all that money u have,still can't beleive that peole are paying money for this shitty game.

That sounds pretty frustrating, and I'd like to help if I can get some more info.  When you say crashing, what do you mean exactly?  For example when is it happening, and what are you seeing?  Are there any error messages?

HI Riot, just want to know why i got ban for no reason...
This not my main account. My main account is B09 Couquer...

I wouldn't want to give out any personal details about your own account on the boards, but if you hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we'll be able to go over everything about any bans there.

After the patch when a game starts I often fail to connect and I have to close and open league fully to reconnect. My ping is 100-150 but I don't see anything happening in real time and there are constantly delays making the game unplayable. Not sure if this is the best place to post but I have no idea what is wrong nor what to do.{{item:3070}}

It sounds like your network is having a hard time making that initial connection to the game server you would be playing on. Those delays might be caused by packet loss, which could explain that connection issue also. 

Look over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), especially the bit on packet loss, and let me know if that helps!

Hi there im having an issue where when i start the patching proccess it's download at between 2100 kb/s - 2300kb/s, however after around 4 or 5 minutes it slows down to 300ish kb/s. i have tried downloading other things and they all download as fast as usual so im pretty sure it's not my internet connection. is there a fix for this or will i have to let it crawl to the finish line? 
Cheers

Hmmmm your connection might be hitting a sort of 'rough patch' where it starts to slow down. We should be able to smooth that out by going over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
i have 2 matches in a row that i dont receive ip fix this thing dude

Sometimes it can take a bit for your point values to update on your client. You can try refreshing your values by relogging into the client, but you did still get that IP! You can also try to force a refresh by clicking on an item in the store to purchase, and then backing out without actually buying anything.

Hello Riot, so I've been trying to load up the League client and it hasn't been working. Every time I try to load it up it just stays a black screen and lets me do nothing to it, not even drag it across my screen. Any advice?

This black screen suggests a network issue that's failing to load assets on the client.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
Thank you so much, you're a game saver

I am playing LOL with my mac pro 2014 model (in macOS) , It's been really good, but after it was updated to patch 7.6, FPS drops so frequently in a game even it shows the FPS is 60, game was totally frozen for few seconds then continue. This happened a couple of times during a game, which is really annoying. I understand that it might be the problem of my computer, but i have tried reinstall the game, reinstalled my laptop. Nothing is changed, LAGS and FPS drop still exist in the game. This all happen in patch 7.6, wonder what can i do to improve it, or it might be the problem of the game ( some bugs).

Hmmmm when your game is freezing it might be a sign that your graphics driver is having a hard time displaying everything properly. It could be something simple like an out of date driver. Look through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) and let me know how that helps!

Hello Riot, i tried to launch the game today, but  the launch option is not there,i also reinstalled the game and i still  have the same problem,  the logo beneath the option " launch" that should be there is rolling and nothing is happening, i would appreaciate the help.

When the launch button isn't working or doesn't appear, it might be a sign that your network is having a hard time talking with our servers. If it can't get a stable connection it won't be able to let you into the client. Check out our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get you back on the Rift!

Hi,i'm having this problem! I downloaded League yesterday it took me about 6-7 hours(Crappy Wi-Fi) and entered the game for the first time! I signed in, put a nickname,added my summoner icon and played for a while! I closed the app and then today when i entered the game it was re-downloading something(and still is) " Step 1/1 | 1027 MB ". I already had downloaded this yesterday,why is it re-downloading? Will it keep happening? What do i do if this keeps happening?-Please Help- (I will download this today too but if still keeps doing the same thing everyday i'll have to do something to fix it)

Your client was probably just scanning its files to make sure everything was in order. It won't happen everytime you open the patcher, but it will need to download updates from time to time as well. It's best to let it scan and do its thing, but if you see any errors pop up reach back out to us!

hi people from riot I submitted a ticket and talked to someone and he told me the patch usually takes long to download from 1 to 34 % and than it spikes up, but its been more than 6 hours and I'm still at 45 % at a 100 to 150 kbps and its really disappointing that you guys can help us with that problem, because there is  multiple people having the same problem, and your tickets response time is 24 hours by that time I might be at 80 %. really frustrating

Sometimes it can take awhile to download the full patch depending on how long it's been since you patched and the stability of your network's connection to our patching servers. You might see a faster download if you try to patch using a hardwired connection instead of wifi. You can also try looking over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if some of the steps there can help speed up the patch.
my main league account Ign:Tsyma isnt letting me log in,It was working a few days ago but now it doenst work and i cant even log into it.

Anytime you're having problems getting logged into your account, you can always reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). We'll be able to go much more in detail about your account information through your ticket!

riot just now i loosed a ranked game i was going into bronse 1 it was my last match but something happened it was connection problem but i tried it wasnt from my internet i tried and i watched videos from youtube in 1080p without laggs nuw i loosed my chance to go in bronse 1 fix ur game rio fix itt :@

Even though you're able to watch youtube and browse the internet, your network can still have troubles communicating with specific servers from time to time. Run through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and we should be able to get to the bottom those disconnects!

Hit us up if that doesn't help!

i have a 1800mgb update i don't know why and when i dowload like it's half it say to me unspecifed error please check logs for more informations 
then i downloaded hextech repair tool it didn't do anything for me
The issue can vary depending on when the error happened.  At what percent did you get the message?
